chapter.title: Definitions
chapter.summary: List of used definitions with explanations.

dict.di: Atomic chain of characters representing single parsing unit.
Set of instructions defining rules of constructing and parsing source.
Artifact representing reusable and redefinable set of grammar instructions.
Redefinition of grammar instruction within specified scope under original name.
Constructing new grammar instruction by extending existing definition.
Wrapping different grammar withing specified elements of defined language. For example argument of every java.sql.Statement.executeQuery call can be resolved as SQL statements.
Including different grammar as native part of specified language. For example including native XML as part of source code.
